header.title: Congratulations. You've Been Qualified.
header.subheadline: Your spot in Conqeuror December is reserved but have not been subsidized yet, Claim it today..

paragraphs: You are one of a limited number of people invited to prove our most important discovery: that a December start is the single biggest hack to achieving your 2026 fitness goals.

logic.title: The Logic Is Simple
paragraphs: Our data is clear. The "all or nothing" pressure of a New Year's Day resolution often fails.

highlightBox.text: By starting now, you enter the New Year with a win. That simple shift is why our December users have an astonishing 91% completion rate.

logic.closingParagraph: You are here because you're ready to be part of that 91%.

mission.title: Your Mission: The 3 Simple Steps
mission.intro: Your place in the experiment is subsidized by our Black Friday fund. Here's how to claim it:

challenge.title: Where Will Your First Challenge Take You?
paragraphs: Your 50% subsidy applies to any of the 100+ real world locations.
Every mile you log in the real world (walking, running, cycling, or swimming) moves you along the virtual map. When you cross the finish line, your medal is shipped.
Will you hike the Inca Trail? Run the length of Route 66? Or walk the Great Wall of China?

cta.buttonText: Claim your 50% subsidized and achieve your 2026 fitness goals
cta.declineText: No thanks, I already achieved my fitness goals in 2025
